# Overview
** TRY FOR FREE! [Main site](https://studio.azureml.net/) **

AzureML is a GUI for developing statistical models and then exposing them via an API for applications to interact with. Additionally, there is now a notebook facility for making interactive analyses.

AzureML can use "off-the-shelf" modules, R code and custom packages, and Python so it's really extensible.
![AzureML Poster](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stephlocke/lazyCDN/master/AzureMLPoster.png)

# Building models
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stephlocke/lazyCDN/master/azureML.png)

- Use pre-existing data to develop a model
- `Import Data` does not connect to a SQL Server - need to use zipped data
- Right-click on circles at the bottom of a GUI object to get to the visualise section
